text:
Additional edit: I have used his services twice now, each time he was very upfront, helpful and gave really great turnaround even when I told him it was okay not to rush. Really trust using his services and am more than happy to leave my pc in his care, unlike other experiences I had w other ppl.

Review: Recommended by a friend to contact Dino when my desktop started acting up. Also decided to ask him whether I could upgrade my 6 years old setup. Dino was v professional, friendly and easy to talk to, and gave me very upfront info and advice on what I needed etc. At certain points he even showed me what was available on the market and he would provide comparisons, information etc. without any pressure to buy.

Now my PC has been upgraded and runs v well, and I'm v appreciative of his work. :)

Thanks again!

Had a malfunction Acer Aspire V5 Laptop lying around for years.
Fortunately found Dino, a humble gentleman who can repair my laptop at an affordable rate.
With his professional IT skills, he made Laptop working again.

Desktop down and found Dino thru internet. Very prompt response even though it was a Sunday. All in all a very good experience. Dino was friendly, knowledgeable and helpful! Price was reasonable and service was good. Will recommend to friends.

Mighty impressed with the gentleman! Very professional, provided right guidance and very genuine. My Spectre x360 refused to boot and I tried all troubleshooting options. I randomly came across Dino while searching for technician and he responded so fast and fixed the problem within a day. Highly recommend!

Dino is very friendly and also knowledgeable in finding out the problem and also providing solutions. Also, he's very transparent about everything and he's an easy guy to talk to. Definitely feel at ease in leaving my laptop problems in his capable hands. Good.
